item.description:
Hi Energy fans there will be a talk from Shara Brown from the seacoast "Green Alliance" come out and listen to some interesting discussions on sustainability. Some more info.
Location: MUB (Memorial Union Building) Theater 1

"We are a really dynamic organization that is working with local businesses to help them become more sustainable: we evaluate out businesses, rate and score them and help promote them to the community through outreach, education and creative messaging. We also are a co-op where residents can access all of our green goods and services at a discount. We are a green Business to Business Networking group; all of our green business owners come together on a monthly basis to strategize and promote their businesses with sustainability a priority. I also put out a newsletter called the Alliance GAzette, which goes out to well over 8,000 green-leaning Seacoast residents each month.

I have been working on energy/environmental/advocacy issues in the community for the past 10 years; I have been on City Council, the Zoning Board and currently serve as the Chair of the Kittery Energy Committee (a group which I formed)."

Learn more about the Seacoast Green Alliance by visiting their website:

www.greenalliance.biz

See you there!

Peter
item.name: Seacoast Green Alliance
